alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greenbrier, northeastern Summers and north central Monroe Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alderson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alderson... Rupert... Wolfcreek... Asbury... Glenray... Williamsburg... and Maxwelton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier
